definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)
way of handling sth/method for making/work method/recipe/practice/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The assembling process is complex for fitting way, but it has a high assembling accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 修配法裝配過程複雜，但裝配精度高。

sentences.english: The first use of cemented fragmental rock filling in China was conducted atTongkeng tin mine operated by Dachang Mine Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 大廠銅坑錫礦在國內率先使用塊石砂漿膠結充填法。

sentences.english: Silver-coated carbonyl iron powder was prepared by using electroless plating method.
sentences.chinese: 用化學鍍法，甲醛爲還原劑，製備鍍銀羰基鐵粉。

sentences.english: The method based on region connectivity analysis and matched template for locating of news video caption.
sentences.chinese: 新聞視頻字幕定位的連通域法及模板匹配法。

sentences.english: This opens it to a brute-force attack over a network.
sentences.chinese: 這爲網絡上用暴力法攻擊開了方便之門。

sentences.english: Yet regulating haemostasis is a complex balancing act.
sentences.chinese: 然而控制止血法這一平衡過程相當複雜。

sentences.english: During 2 years observation and came to the conclusion that the best training method was branch bending method.
sentences.chinese: 經兩年調查結果，三種方法中以屈株法效果最佳。

sentences.english: The finite element analysis (FEA) and the variable density methods were used. The optimization method and process were presented.
sentences.chinese: 採用有限元法與變密度法，給出了優化方法和步驟。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the efficacy of Blattella germanica control with gel bait and poison powder.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察套餐法控制酒店德國小蠊的效果。

sentences.english: A dual-channel instantaneous soil radon measurement instrument based on the method of electrostatic collection is designed.
sentences.chinese: 設計一套基於靜電收集法的雙道瞬時土壤測氡儀。

sentences.english: Methods Catching by gluing in the cave vicinity and body surface of host's animal.
sentences.chinese: 方法洞穴粘捕法和宿主動物體表檢蚤法。

sentences.english: While thiol method was simple but much more time costing for reaction.
sentences.chinese: 巰基法操作較爲簡單，但所需的反應時間較長。

sentences.english: The drug concentration of Zhi Gancao Decoction contained serum was examined by serologic pharmacological test.
sentences.chinese: 血清藥理學法確定血清中炙甘草湯含藥濃度。

sentences.english: The domestic caustic soda production techniques by diaphragm method and ion-exchange membrane method at present are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了當前國內隔膜法和離子膜法燒鹼的生產技術。

sentences.english: Joshua therefore commanded the priests, saying, Come ye up out of Jordan.
sentences.chinese: 你吩咐擡法櫃的祭司從約旦河裏上來。

sentences.english: A novel two-phase model for the fluidized bed of polyethylene with condensed mode operation was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 建立了氣相法聚乙烯冷凝模式操作反應器的兩相模型。

definition: illustration/diagram/graphical representation/to explain with the aid of a diagram
the person himself/I (humble form used in speeches)/oneself/myself/in person/personal
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
